title: Gardening: The Essential Organic Gardening Guide Book: From Begi
description:
Gardening: The Essential Organic Gardening Guide Book: From Beginner to Expert Gardening Guide to Growing Organic Vegetables, Herbs And Fruit 


Do you want to grow your own organic vegetables, herbs and fruit? but not sure where to start?

Have you ever found yourself a little frustrated that anything you try and grow, dies soon after planting and has been a waste of your time, money and effort?

How about simple step by step instruction that even the most novice of gardeners can produce amazing, organic food in just a few hours from now?

If so, you've found the right book!

It's no surprise in this day and age with so much technology, it is often hard to be sure what chemicals you are ingesting with your food. The vegetables you buy from supermarkets may look bright and fresh but did you also know they are constantly sprayed with strong chemicals that can be seriously unhealthy for your body. I know for sure that I'm not going to expose myself or my children to these chemicals, you shouldn't either!

By eating non organic you can have:

Low energy levels. 

A slow metabolism

Low libido/sex drive

Depression

Little to no motivation

Organic food can change all of this and give you a completely new out look on life. You will really notice a HUGE boost in energy levels! The taste of organic food is not the only advantage. It really does change many aspects of your life. It's time to change your bad habits and start a new life with organic food. I am going to help you along the way so you can set up your very own organic garden as fast as possible.

This is a book of ACTION, I have outlined the essentials steps you need to take to know everything that I know of years of research and studying in as little as a couple of hours. That's why I have written this book for you that is in very simple to read. I have designed this book to take a complete beginner to to expert (and any one in between) so you can produce amazing, organic food with my instructions.

Are you ready to experience the joy of having your own very own organic garden?

What will you learn? Well here's a preview...

Getting started and preparing your soil - This is a very important and without this information your garden may never grow at all!

5 different soil mixtures you should use for maximum growing success. Get this right and you'll be able to grow virtually anything, anywhere, anytime!

Day-To-Day plant care. Now everything's planted up and growing nicely, you should tend your plants with loving care. Here's what to do to get maximum life and enjoyment from everything you grow!

Using fertilizers - Learn what organic fertilizers you should use on your garden while keeping away from the chemicals.

Dangers - What to look out for and how to avoid them. (Very important)

How will your daily life improve growing your own organic food at home?

No harmful toxins and chemicals

This is the freshest food you will ever get!

Organic foods better for our environment. This is because there will be no chemicals seeping into the soil.

Growing your own food is also a great money saver!

It is great fun and very educational for you and your children.

Fast and easy! No need to drive to the shops. Just walk to your garden and you will have everything you need
